title: Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning-Based Mathematics Teaching Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematical Concepts and Foundational Pedagogical Knowledge
context.additional_context: A course designed to help pre-service teachers effectively apply computer-supported collaborative learning in elementary and secondary mathematics instruction. It develops competencies applicable to real classroom scenarios through team-based projects and peer feedback activities in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically document and share math problem-solving strategies in collaboration with team members.
Learners can produce learning content adhering to accurate terminology and notation standards when using collaborative learning platforms.
Learners can complete projects that improve team performance by 20% or more using feedback request/provision mechanisms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
